mapper.select: select keshi_name as serialName,keshi_num as serialCount1 from keshi order by keshi_num*1 desc;
select course_name as serialName,doctor_num as serialCount1,patient_num as serialCount2 from kecheng_doctor_patient order by patient_num*1 ;
select kecheng_name as serialName,kecheng_num as serialCount1 from kecheng order by kecheng_num*1 desc;
select course_name as serialName,patient_num as serialCount1,timeperviewer as serialCount2 from kecheng_patient_viewer order by timeperviewer*1;
select date as serialName,course_num as serialCount1,doctor_reg_num as serialCount2 from date_course_reg order by date;
select distinct prov_name as serialName,prov_num as serialCount1 from bi_doc order by prov_num*1 desc;
select city_name as serialName,city_num as serialCount1 from bi_doc order by city_num*1 desc;
select city_name as serialName,city_num as serialCount1 from bi_doc where prov_name = #{selectedProvince} order by city_num*1 desc

select doctor_name as DoctorName,hospital_name as HospitalName,prov_name as ProvinceName,city_name as CityName,keshi_name as KeShiName from detail_info where keshi_name like "%${keshi_name}%" or city_name like "%${keshi_name}%" or hospital_name like "%${keshi_name}%" or doctor_name like "%${keshi_name}%" limit #{start},10;
select count(*) from detail_info where keshi_name like "%${str}%" or city_name like "%${str}%" or hospital_name like "%${str}%" or doctor_name like "%${str}%";
